info.title: Swingball 2
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Swingball 2 is a sequel to a time based platformer with the ability to swing from almost anything.

Controls:
Pointer = Aim
Analog stick = Move
A button = Jump
B button = Swing

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

music (The Jackals) by ara
ccmixter.org/people/ara
